message: We are happy to announce that Siril's scripting interface now supports script GUIs written in PyQt6, which we have confirmed works on all the supported platforms and which is much better performing than tkinter. You will shortly see many of the scripts written by the Siril team updated to use this GUI, though some third party scripts may take longer to update. tkinter scripts will still work fine.

Gaiaâ€™s online server is currently experiencing intermittent issues, which may occasionally cause Siril to crash when trying to access it. The crash has already been fixed for upcoming versions of Siril, but the server problem itself remains and is beyond our control. To work around this, please install the local Gaia catalog that we have built specifically for this purpose.
